name: Ramen Hashi
overview: Ramen Hashi begins when a young japanese soldier returns from World War II to his town and decide to open a ramen restaurant and that he will become the best ramen chef of all Japan. During the game time will advance since the 50's until modern times and the character will go through different restaurants. The gameplay is a mix between a first person adventure game (since there are times in the game where the player have to walk around the town and talk to different characters to advance in the game) and a cooking game, since most of the times the player have to choose different ingredients to make different ramen dishes that he will serve to the customers that arrive to his restaurant and will earn more money and got more customers depending of his recipes and serving attitude. When a customer tells you what he though about your meal the player can decide what reaction what his character to do (angry, normal, apologize, joking, gentle, flirtation, etc.). With the money that he earned he can buy new ingredients to make new dishes.
